twcore.bots.multibot.bship
Class bship

java.lang.Object
  twcore.bots.MultiModule
      twcore.bots.multibot.bship.bship
All Implemented Interfaces:
TSChangeListener
public class bship
extends MultiModule
implements TSChangeListener

Battleship Bot This bot regulates the specific attach requirements needed in the battleship arena, manipulates the night mode lvz objects, and hosts battleship main game events. Extremely flexible in the way games can be set up on multiple boards and with practically any team-ship arrangement. Check http://d1st0rt.sscentral.com for latest releases

Version:
06.06.22
